workAndExperience.title: Bachelor's in Computer Science (Game & Mobile Development)

projects.name: Recreation of Lightner's Live
projects.desc: Lightners Live, a segment from Toby Fox's Deltarune, is a short rhythm game that appears during Chapter 3 of the game. I aim to recreate this segment, with a few additions of my own, such as additional songs, a slightly different approach to song/map difficulty, and more. GitHub: https://github.com/vVvOvOvVv/Lightners-Live

projects.name: FPS Prototype - Graveborn
projects.desc: Within a month, I have developed a small-scale game in a group of 5 people, with me leading the overall design and development of the game. We split the work by level design, enemy AI development, menus/UI, and other tasks amongst ourselves. We utilized Unity 3D to develop the game, using free public assets for the game, including character models, animations, particle effects, and VFX.

projects.name: VR Room
projects.desc: A group project of a room in VR made in Unity. This project was done for a university assignment and made use of GitHub Desktop for file sharing and version control. Communication was done primarily over Discord, and testing was done using both a Meta Quest 3 and Unity's XR simulator.

projects.name: Developer Portfolio
projects.desc: Created as a way to showcase my projects, and brush up on Web, I present this website!

projects.name: Deltarune Cursors
projects.desc: Using aseprite, I created my own set of cursors, featuring several characters from Deltarune, allowing fans to change their own cursors into custom ones! Avaiable for free on my Ko-Fi :)
